articles.author: Max Goldbart
articles.title: George Galloway Says He Was Stalked By ‘Baby Reindeer’s Real-Life Martha But “Wishes Her The Best” In Netflix Legal Action - Deadline
articles.description: George Galloway has said he was stalked by 'Baby Reindeer's Fiona Harvey, coming after Harvey sued Netflix for defamation and negligence.
articles.content:
George Galloway, the controversial Scottish politician and TV personality, has said he was “relentlessly” and “physically” stalked by the real-life Martha from Baby Reindeer. 
In a clip from a Piers… [+1985 chars]

articles.title: The Aftermath Of Dr. Disrespect's Twitch Ban Reveal - Forbes
articles.description: The days-long saga of the apparent reveal of Guy “Dr. Disrespect” Beahm’s infamous ban from Twitch took a significant turn yesterday, and now the dust is settling.
